mapper.select: SELECT sr.s_recruit_no, sr.mem_no, subquery.com_no, subquery.com_id, subquery.com_name, subquery.com_size, subquery.com_addr, subquery.recruit_no, subquery.FIELD, subquery.education, subquery.pay, subquery.title, subquery.deadline_date FROM scrap_recruit sr JOIN (SELECT c.com_no, c.com_id, c.com_name, c.com_size, c.com_addr, r.recruit_no, r.FIELD, r.education, r.pay, r.title, r.deadline_date FROM company c JOIN recruit r ON r.com_no = c.com_no) subquery ON sr.recruit_no = subquery.recruit_no WHERE mem_no = ${param1};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mem_recruit VALUES(0, #{param1}, #{param2}, null, FALSE, #{param3});
mapper.select: SELECT mr.mem_recruit_no, mr.mem_no, mr.pass, subquery.com_no, subquery.com_id, subquery.com_name, subquery.com_size, subquery.com_addr, subquery.recruit_no, subquery.FIELD, subquery.education, subquery.pay, subquery.title, subquery.deadline_date FROM mem_recruit mr JOIN (SELECT c.com_no, c.com_id, c.com_name, c.com_size, c.com_addr, r.recruit_no, r.FIELD, r.education, r.pay, r.title, r.deadline_date FROM company c JOIN recruit r ON r.com_no = c.com_no) subquery ON mr.recruit_no = subquery.recruit_no WHERE mem_no = ${param1};
